AifsArmed.Description: If this field is true, AIFS flow is triggered

AifsSignatureIdList.Description: List of signature Id which has AIFS flow enabled

DisableAifsResetOnSyncfloodCounter.Description: Disable AIFS Reset on syncflood counter

DramCeccPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, DRAM Cecc correctable errors will be polled.

McaPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, MCA correctable errors will be polled.

PcieAerPollingEn.Description: If this field is true, PCIE AER correctable errors will be polled.

DramCeccThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding is enable for DRAM CECC errors.

McaThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding is enable for MCa errors

PcieAerThresholdEn.Description: If this field is true, error thresholding is enable for PCIE AER errors.

McaPollingPeriod.Description: Polling time period for MCA errors

DramCeccPollingPeriod.Description: Polling time period for DRAM CECC errors

PcieAerPollingPeriod.Description: Polling time period for PCIE AER errors

DramCeccErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold value for DRAM CECC errors.

McaErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold value for MCA errors.

PcieAerErrThresholdCnt.Description: Error threshold value for PCIE AER errors.
